tool_description: Generates formatted alerts with risk context and recommended actions when thresholds are breached.

current_values.description: Current metric values that triggered alerts

error_messages: No triggered rules: At least one triggered rule must be provided.
Mismatched arrays: triggered_rules and current_values must have the same length.
Invalid rule references: One or more rule IDs are not valid.
usage: Provide triggered_rules and corresponding current_values arrays. Returns formatted alert messages with context and recommendations.
